website_summaries.verdict: Lightning-fast and energy efficient, this rugged printer can handle even the toughest jobs thrown its way while still producing clear, crisp copy.
pros: In SuperSpeed Draft mode, it will print up to 570 characters per second
Internal cooling fan keeps printer going, even during long or unattended jobs
works with Windows 10 and can handle multiple print projects, including labels
cons: For larger jobs, may want to invest in extra printheads: they can wear out, making the print less legible

customer_reviews.title: Old school printing
customer_reviews.text: This is a rock solid printer. We use 3 of these in USB mode to print different multi-part forms. They do wear out but for the most part are solid device. Maintenance is key for longevity because of the paper feed etc.
customer_reviews.author: J. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Print tattoo transfers!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! I bought it to print out clearer tattoo stencils and it does the job perfectly. I highly recommend this to all the tattoo artists out there still using thermal transfers.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Eshero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great dot matrix electric printer at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Keener

customer_reviews.title: Replaced Oki MICROLINE 420 that had broken tractor feed. ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced Oki MICROLINE 420 that had broken tractor feed. Built-in obsolescence. What can one do when it's a required piece of office
customer_reviews.author: Jacquerie, Miami, FL

customer_reviews.title: Replaced old one
customer_reviews.text: Love there printer. The very best you can buy. Replaced 20 year old Okidata
customer_reviews.author: Gary the Great

customer_reviews.title: Problem with printer ribbon advancing.
customer_reviews.text: Either the printer cartridge is defective or the ribbon advance gear on the printer doesn't work. I've ordered a new printer cartridge. If that does the same thing (ribbon doesn't advance and ends up bunching up inside the cartridge), it's a defect in the machine and I'll have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: OutSide Lookin In

customer_reviews.title: So far the printer have been working great. I was surprise it ship to me so ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy this month ago and don't have time to rate it yet till now. So far the printer have been working great. I was surprise it ship to me so fast. Great service and good product.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: real workhorse. been through many generations of these printers and this one stands up to large workloads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but with one caveat
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyone who needs to print 5-part forms (like for a car dealership) with just one caveat; brand new 64-bit Windows won't work with this printer, so you may need to consult the people who provide your paperwork software to get it running smoothly (which they should be able to do just fine)
customer_reviews.author: Rick H.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for two months. Now error light on and won’t print
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and amazing. WOW
customer_reviews.text: This dot matrix impact printer is heavy duty, simple, and amazing. WOW! We are very happy with Okidata, PC Nation, and Amazon for pulling their resources together to serve our needs. 5 Star Service.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the Past
customer_reviews.text: It's noisy, clunky and not particularly fast. But it prints my pin-feed checks just fine and has a driver that works for Win7. The vendor I purchased it from threw in several extra ribbon cartridges. That's appreciated; they will probably outlast me.
customer_reviews.author: George Snell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very nice product that gets all of our labels printed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K. Null

customer_reviews.title: Works great and less noisy than the old
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace an old one we use in our office. Works great and less noisy than the old one
customer_reviews.author: Jim Piatek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs well for my family's business. Not as fast as the 320turbo, but that's probably stated somewhere
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Very good on price and good products quality like new
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I just wish it came with better install instructions
customer_reviews.author: S. Motamedi

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great printer so far for a very good price!!! We were concerned that the printer would not take regular paper, but only paper "holes" on the sides. However, we are able to print work savers and labels, including regular types of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Clarke Barber

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Exactly what I needed for printing the docs I beed
customer_reviews.author: joshua wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: took awhile to get it going but it worked out
customer_reviews.author: DickieC

customer_reviews.title: Okidata printers are the best
customer_reviews.text: All we use are Okidata ML 420's (8) They are tough, reliable and easy to set up and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for multi-part forms
customer_reviews.text: This printer is awesome for form printing - fast and quiet. Also, it can fit an 11x17 piece of paper (though I don't think the product description says it can...)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mascari

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: paper jams on a regular basis. Other than that it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
